job_history.work_description: Conduct case review of client issues, research state and agency violations Develop strategy and provide technical assistance for clients to obtain positive outcome Attend IPP, IEP, and mediations with clients as advocate Keep case file, summary, and all necessary documents for referral to attorney if necessary Convened NCLR member organizations to develop statewide action strategies. Developed advocacy materials and organize actions and campaigns Provided training and technical assistance, coordination organizations advance policy.

Researched client issues and manage legal correspondence. Completed outreach and training on disability and special education rights. Wrote media releases for organization events and training. Strategized positive outcomes with attorneys and staff.

Wrote grant proposals, business plans, and press releases Presented strategic plan and goals to a variety of audiences Organized constituents around special education, environmental and health issues Collaborated with 85+ local community leaders and organizations Designed and taught advocacy skills training program to over 300 parents annually Secured over 100k in funding for parent advocacy training programs.

Trained constituents on civil rights and education issues pertaining to Latino children. Promoted self-determination of families and communities. Collaborated with community leaders and organizations around education policy issues. Strategized with attorneys and staff on organizing campaign.

Trained constituents on disability and special education rights. Managed caseload of clients with disability-related issues. Strategized positive outcomes with attorneys and staff. Maintained working knowledge of current disability laws and legislation.

Developed and presented workshops for professionals on needs of high-needs families Worked with homeless families to obtain housing Facilitated cooperative working relationships with other agencies Served as internal consultant to team on special education and disability laws Facilitated cooperative working relationships with other agencies Provided technical assistance to families on policies and procedures.

education.university: St. Edward's University People's College of Law

skills.name: Advocacy
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in advocacy across multiple roles, including developing strategies, providing technical assistance, and training constituents, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Community Organizing
skills.explanation: Over a decade of experience in community organizing, including developing statewide action strategies, convening member organizations, and designing advocacy skills training programs, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Disability Rights
skills.explanation: Strong experience in disability rights, including training constituents, managing caseloads, and maintaining working knowledge of current disability laws and legislation, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Education
skills.explanation: Significant experience in education, including training on special education rights, developing advocacy materials, and organizing actions and campaigns, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Nonprofit Management
skills.explanation: Strong experience in nonprofit management, including securing funding, designing training programs, and collaborating with community leaders and organizations, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Social Justice
skills.explanation: Significant experience in social justice, including advocating for positive outcomes, promoting self-determination of families and communities, and strategizing with attorneys and staff, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Strong experience in leadership, including convening member organizations, designing training programs, and collaborating with community leaders and organizations, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Solid experience in project management, including developing strategic plans, managing caseloads, and securing funding, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Solid experience in communication, including writing media releases, presenting strategic plans, and facilitating cooperative working relationships, showing a solid working proficiency.
